hero.title: You don't deserve the best
hero.subtitle: Development company connecting consumers and construction in Azerbaijan
hero.description: We provide the best solutions to achieve our clients' success.

about.title: WHO WE ARE?
about.description: Alians Development is a leading company operating in the real estate sector in Azerbaijan. Our mission is to provide our customers with high-quality, modern and reliable living spaces. Our team consists of experienced architects, engineers and project managers who carefully plan and execute every project. We prioritize customer satisfaction and apply the highest standards in every project.

businessModel.title: OUR BUSINESS MODEL
businessModel.description: As Alians Development, our business model consists of 4 main parts. Our team has built the entire process based on your convenience. Your wishes are taken into account at every stage of our business model

step1.title: Research
step1.description: Here, the location, price, apartment renovation that the population mainly wants to buy are researched and offered.

step2.title: Project
step2.description: Based on the plan determined in the initial stage, the location of the project and the plan of the project are selected.

step3.title: Construction
step3.description: After obtaining the project plan, the construction of the building begins.

step4.title: Sales
step4.description: First of all, our customer service is organized. Information is provided to customers both in person and remotely

reliability.title: RELIABILITY
reliability.description: You can expect precisely drafted contracts, all necessary documentation and complete confidentiality.

quality.title: WORK QUALITY
quality.description: Leading architects, builders and designers use original ideas and new approaches in all projects.

compatibility.title: SCHEDULE COMPLIANCE
compatibility.description: We strictly adhere to the prepared activity plan and implement control and precise execution of all stages of the process.

contactForm.title: HAVE A QUESTION?
contactForm.description: Our company specializes in the development and implementation of commercial office and retail property projects, as well as economy class, business class and premium residential developments.

questions.q1: What types of projects do you specialize in?
questions.q2: What is the project completion timeframe?
